extendedInfo.description: Ever went to trip, party or fest with group of friends? Ever had problems tracking who paid for who and what is current balance between participants? "Share Event Expenses" is clean and simple app, which helps helps to track your spendings, split cash flows and send current balances by email and SMS.

reviews.title: Nice, but there are better apps
reviews.comment: I have tried it, design is pretty good. But lacks support for currencies and calculations who should send money to whom. App \"Settle Up\" is better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple interface, perhaps a bit too simple. How do you edit payments, or delete an event?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice flow for entering expenses, but can\'t edit amounts already entered.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice, simple app, does what expected. Currency support is missing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An app which works half-way is a waste of time.
reviews.comment: App \"flipment\" does the job. I\'ve tried 5 different kind of these apps and it\'s the only complete one
reviews.author: Alessandro Balbiano
